title: Health: the inside story
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education

description: A common-sense approach to attaining and maintaining good health. Shows the role of muscular endurance, heart and lung endurance and nutrition in a healthy lifestyle. Indicates health hazards such as smoking and stress, and emphasises the need for relaxation. Suitable for secondary level.
